item.title: Lutosławski, “Principles of Stylometry" (A Translation)
item.description: Wincenty Lutosławski, “Principles of Stylometry Applied to the Chronology of Plato’s Works”1 [Translation of Wincenty Lutosławski, « Principes de stylométrie appliqués à la chronologie des œuvres de Platon », Revue des Études Grecques 11.41 (1898): 61–81.] Translated by Brian J. Reilly [Original text is in the public domain in the United States of America; this translation is copyright © 2018 Brian J. Reilly; non-commercial use is allowed with attribution. Note that the status of this translation is preliminary!

About - Silva Portentosa img { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } About Silva Portentosa comprises texts, translations, and miscellanea by Brian J. Reilly (PhD, French, Yale University). It also provides the scratch work for the following projects: Digital Bédier will provide an interactive text and translation of La tradition manuscrite du Lai de l'ombre by Joseph Bédier French Studies will provide statistics about the history of French Studies in the United States of America Until those projects' sites are ready, their content will be blogged about here first.
